trans-unit.resname: DDN·1 | Zurgo Helmsmasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDN·1 | Zurgo Helmsmasher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·1 | Zurgo Helmsmasher | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·1 | Zurgo Helmsmasher | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个本回合中曾受到CARDNAME伤害的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·13 | Mardu Heart-Piercer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Raid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 突击～当CARDNAME进战场时，若你本回合中攻击过，则CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·34 | Nomad Outpost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

trans-unit.resname: DDN·46 | Jeskai Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 灵技（每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: DDN·46 | Jeskai Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·58 | Thousand Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDN·58 | Thousand Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 变身{5}{U}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: DDN·58 | Thousand Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，将所有其他已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: DDN·73 | Mystic Monastery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDN·73 | Mystic Monastery | Card Text | Paragraph 2
